```{r include=FALSE}
library(cffr)
initopt <- getOption("cffr_message_verbosity", NULL)
options("cffr_message_verbosity" = NULL)
```

```{r}
# Don't do
entity <- "Elephant and Castle"

# Do

```

